channel.title: Genesis and the Big Bang: Classic Sinai Podcast
channel.itunes:description: Jewish audio mp3s for the curious mind.
channel.itunes:author: Dr. Gerald Schroeder
channel.description: Dr Gerald Schroeder gives a natural approach to align what the scientists claim about the Big Bang with the creation account given in the Book of Genesis.
